content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (1, 1) with burner inserter at (1.5, 2.5) and wooden chest at (1.5, 3.5)
- Stone furnace at (3, 1) with burner inserter at (3.5, 2.5) and wooden chest at (3.5, 3.5)
- Additional burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5) with wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Production Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5) with burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) with burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)
- Connected via transport belts

### Electronic Circuit Production at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input inserters and chests system
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5) with burner inserter at (23.5, 15.5)

### Power Generation System (In Progress)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Extensive pipe network connecting these components (multiple PipeGroups)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities, including:
- Belt network from smelting areas to assembly machines
- Belt system for material transport between different production sections
- Complex inserter-chest combinations for material handling

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure you have the required items (pipes) in inventory before attempting to connect fluid entities
- Plan pipe connections in shorter segments to avoid long-distance connection issues

### Errors with crafting
- Check if you have all required materials before attempting to craft items
- For items requiring machines (like iron plates), ensure you're using appropriate production facilities (furnaces) rather than trying to craft manually

### Power system issues
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Check that all power-requiring entities are properly connected to the power network

### Production line issues
- Verify resource availability before setting up production chains
- Ensure assembling machines have power and required input materials
